project_descr: Restoration of the Prespa Lake Ecosystem - Contribution to the improvement of the Prespa Lake’s Ecological State and its Resilience

outputs.output_descr: The overall objective of this project is to introduce a set of comprehensive measures that will significantly improve the Prespa Lake’s overall health, strengthen its resilience, and ensure, in the long-run, control of the eutrophication processes.
